original_text: “If a person turns to mediums and necromancers, whoring after them, I will set my face against that person and will cut him off from among his people.
korean_text: 접신한 자와 박수무당을 음란하게 따르는 자에게는 내가 진노하여 그를 그의 백성 중에서 끊으리니

sentences.original_text: If a person turns to mediums and necromancers
sentences.korean_translation: 만약 한 사람이 영매와 점쟁이에게로 돌아서면

sentences.original_text: I will set my face against that person
and will cut him off from among his people
